snippet: A woman was arrested and her boyfriend was charged with murder in the death of a girl whose body was found inside a trash bag on a Boston Harbor island.
abstract: Rachelle Bond is arrested as accessory to murder after the fact in death of her 2-year-old daughter Bella; girl's body was found on Deer Island in Boston Harbor in June; Bond's boyfriend Michael McCarthy is charged with murder.
lead_paragraph: A woman was arrested and her boyfriend was charged with murder in the death of a girl whose body was found inside a trash bag on a Boston Harbor island.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Couple Face Charges in Mystery Girl’s Death
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Couple Face Charges in Mystery Girl’s Death
